item.title: 日本周五可能花费 135 亿美元干预日元汇率
item.description: 彭博社（Bloomberg）对日本央行经常账户的分析表明，日本很可能在周五连续第二天进入货币市场。【原文：Japan likely stepped into the currency market for a second straight day on Friday, a Bloomberg analysis of the central bank’s current account indicates.】

item.title: 更名后的 Yandex 计划回购股票，聚焦人工智能新领域
item.description: Nebius 集团是最近重新命名的 Yandex NV 公司，该公司刚刚出售了俄罗斯业务，正在计划回购股票，因为这家技术公司正在重建，目标是成为欧洲最大的商业人工智能基础设施提供商。【原文：Nebius Group, the recently re-named Yandex NV that’s fresh off the sale of its Russian business, is planning a share buyback as the technology company rebuilds with an aim of becoming the largest commercial artificial intelligence infrastructure provider in Europe.】

item.title: 马拉松资产管理公司首席执行官看到了房地产的 "惊人 "机遇
item.description: 马拉松资产管理公司（Marathon Asset Management）首席执行官布鲁斯-理查兹（Bruce Richards）表示，数万亿美元的问题商业地产将在未来两三年内解决，这将为投资者创造 "惊人的机会"。【原文：Trillions of dollars of problematic commercial real estate will have to be worked out over the next two to three years, creating an “amazing amount of opportunity” for investors, according to Marathon Asset Management Chief Executive Officer Bruce Richards.】

item.title: 德国投资者信心一年来首次下滑
item.description: 由于工业未能配合其他行业的逐步复苏，投资者对德国经济的信心一年来首次下降。【原文：Investor confidence in Germany’s economy worsened for the first time in a year as industry fails to match a gradual recovery in other sectors.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰收购 Atalaya，深入拓展私人信贷领域
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，蓝猫资本公司（Blue Owl Capital Inc.【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc. is pushing deeper into the red-hot private credit market with a deal to buy credit manager Atalaya Capital Management, which manages more than $10 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿联酋酒店集团聘请花旗银行和阿布扎比第一银行负责餐饮部门的首次公开募股工作
item.description: 阿布扎比国家酒店集团（Abu Dhabi National Hotels）为其餐饮业务的首次公开募股计划挑选了银行，加入了中东首都繁忙的新股销售队伍。【原文：Abu Dhabi National Hotels has picked banks for a planned initial public offering of its catering business, joining a busy pipeline of new share sales in the Middle Eastern capital.】

item.title: 真蒂洛尼称欧盟 "很快 "将提出乌克兰贷款建议
item.description: 欧盟委员会经济委员保罗-真蒂洛尼（Paolo Gentiloni）表示，欧盟委员会计划 "很快 "就支持乌克兰的 500 亿美元一揽子贷款提出建议，以便在年底最后期限前完成立法工作。【原文：The European Commission plans to make a proposal on a package of $50 billion of loans to support Ukraine “very soon” so as to meet a year-end deadline to complete legislative work, Economy Commissioner Paolo Gentiloni said.】

item.title: 南非基础设施部长称赞建筑业蓬勃发展
item.description: 南非新任基础设施部长呼吁将公共部门投资增加一倍，以助推该国建筑业的繁荣发展。【原文：South Africa’s new infrastructure minister called for a doubling of public sector investment to help fuel a construction boom in the country.】

item.title: 欧元区消费贷款需求自 2022 年以来首次上升
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）称，欧元区银行报告称，自 2022 年以来，消费信贷和住房贷款需求首次出现增长。【原文：Banks in the euro area reported the first increase in demand for consumer credit and housing loans since 2022, the European Central Bank said.】

item.title: 中国金融公司的香港员工面临退薪
item.description: 中国一些最大的国有金融企业要求香港员工退还部分工资，将习近平主席的 "共同富裕 "运动扩展到了这个离岸商业中心。【原文：Some of China’s largest state-backed financial firms are asking employees in Hong Kong to return a portion of their pay, extending President Xi Jinping’s “common prosperity” campaign to the offshore business hub.】

item.title: 新加坡称仍在通缉 1MDB 案逃犯刘在石
item.description: 新加坡当局表示仍在追捕马来西亚逃犯 Low Taek Jho，他与 1Malaysia Development Bhd 涉及数十亿美元的丑闻有关。【原文：Singapore authorities said it is still pursuing Malaysian fugitive Low Taek Jho in connection with a multibillion-dollar scandal related to 1Malaysia Development Bhd.】

item.title: 德意志银行 2019 年财务报告遭监督机构批评
item.description: 据一份新闻稿称，德国监管机构发现德意志银行股份公司几年前提交的一份财务报告中存在缺陷。【原文：A German watchdog has identified a deficiency in a financial report filed by Deutsche Bank AG several years ago, according to a release.】

item.title: Pimco 从摩根士丹利 MUFG 聘请 Kawai 负责日本宏观事务
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co. appointed Ryota Kawai from Morgan Stanley MUFG Securities Co. as portfolio manager at a time when macro trading is making a roaring comeback in Japan.】

item.title: 英国食品杂货通胀率降至近三年最低
item.description: 在英国央行下月做出是否降息的关键决定之前，食品价格通胀率降至 2021 年 9 月以来的最低水平，进一步表明成本压力有所缓解。【原文：Grocery price inflation fell to its lowest level since September 2021 in a further sign of easing cost pressures, ahead of a crucial decision by the Bank of England next month on whether to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 英国水务监管机构将调查另外四家污水泄漏公司
item.description: 英国水务监管机构 Ofwat 将对另外四家公司提起执法诉讼，以调查它们泄漏污水的频率。【原文：UK water regulator Ofwat will open enforcement cases against four more companies to probe how often they’re spilling sewage.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Segantii 退还了超过 90% 的客户资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Segantii Capital Management Ltd. 已返还了超过 90% 的客户资金，而这距离该对冲基金公司告诉投资者将返还资金还不到两个月。【原文：Segantii Capital Management Ltd. has returned more than 90% of its client capital, according to people familiar with the matter, less than two months after the hedge-fund firm told investors that it would give them back their money.】

item.title: 历峰集团在中国市场销售额下降，但仍达到预期目标
item.description: 历峰集团（Richemont SA）第一季度的销售额达到了分析师的预期，尽管中国市场的销售额和对其奢侈手表的需求有所下降。【原文：Richemont SA met analysts’ sales estimates in the first quarter, despite declines in China sales and demand for its luxury watches.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：股市将下跌，英镑仍不足 1.30 美元
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团的标志展示在该公司位于伦敦市的办公中庭。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：A London Stock Exchange Group logo displayed at the company's office atrium in the City of London. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 瑞典银行第二季度净利息收入下降
item.description: 瑞典银行（Swedbank AB）第二季度净利息收入下降。【原文：Swedbank AB reported declining net interest income for the second quarter.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 存储公司 Lineage 据称将在首次公开募股中寻求高达 38.5 亿美元的投资
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，温控存储和物流巨头 Lineage 公司正在寻求在首次公开募股中筹集多达 38.5 亿美元的资金。【原文：Temperature-controlled storage and logistics giant Lineage Inc. is seeking to raise as much as $3.85 billion in its initial public offering, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 把握 "特朗普交易 "时机，关注美国共和党党纲
item.description:
与特朗普 2.0 的前景相比，美联储和降息对投资者决策的影响更大。自 2016 年以来，市场已经发生了变化。【原文：

The Fed and rate cuts have more impact on investor decisions than the prospect of Trump 2.0. And markets have changed since 2016.

】

item.title: 澳大利亚养老金基金向私人信贷基金投入 2.7 亿澳元
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的养老基金之一 Rest 向 Metrics Credit Partners 的房地产私人信贷基金投资了 4 亿澳元（2.7 亿美元）。【原文：Rest, one of Australia’s largest pension funds, has invested A$400 million ($270 million) in Metrics Credit Partners’ real estate private credit fund.】

item.title: 您现在需要了解的加密货币术语
item.description: 无论你是钻石手还是普通人，这里都有值得了解的行话指南。【原文：Here’s your guide to the jargon that's actually worth knowing, whether you've got diamond hands or are just a normie.】

item.title: 中国制造业增速连续三个季度超过经济增速
item.description: 中国制造业增速连续第三个季度超过整体经济增速，凸显了工业和出口对世界第二大经济体增长的推动作用。【原文：China’s manufacturing sector grew faster than the overall economy for a third quarter in a row, underscoring how industry and exports are driving growth in the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 香港业主为填补空置写字楼支付更高的中介费
item.description: 随着开发商努力填补这个亚洲金融中心的空置商业空间，香港的亿万富翁业主正在向中介支付更高的佣金，以招揽写字楼租户。【原文：Hong Kong’s billionaire landlords are paying agents larger commissions for bringing in office tenants as developers struggle to fill empty commercial space in the Asian financial hub.】

item.title: 中国人民银行在缴税和关注利率之际大幅注资
item.description: 中国央行通过日常操作向银行系统注入了自一月份以来最多的现金，以便在纳税额增加和国家领导人开会制定经济议程之际保持充裕的流动性。【原文：China’s central bank injected the most amount of cash to its banking system since January via its daily operations, to keep liquidity plentiful as tax payments mount and the country’s leaders meet to set the economic agenda.】

item.title: 沃达丰 Idea 可能迎来更多好消息
印度 L&T 公司评级提升，有望赢得更多全球订单
item.description: 印度最大的工程和建筑公司拉森-土布罗有限公司（Larsen & Toubro Ltd.）在获得高于主权国家的全球信用评级后，预计其国际业务将得到提振，而国内市场则会放缓。【原文：India’s largest engineering and construction company Larsen & Toubro Ltd. expects its international business to get a boost while domestic market slows, after receiving global credit ratings higher than the sovereign’s.】

item.title: 瑞银称美国征收 60% 关税将使中国增长率减半
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的最新研究显示，对所有中国输美产品征收 60% 的新关税将使中国的年增长率减半以上，这凸显了如果前总统唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫，中国政府将面临的风险。【原文：New tariffs of 60% on all Chinese exports to the US would more than halve China’s annual growth rate, according to new research from UBS Group AG, underscoring the risks for Beijing if former President Donald Trump returns to the White House.】
